features: 【Built-in Microphone & Great Compatibility】: iClever wired headphones work with the In-line microphone making them perfect for Online Courses and Voice calls. These Over-Ear headphones support devices with 3.5mm audio jack like Chromebook, Kindle Fire Tablet, Switch, iPad, Laptop, PC etc.

【85/94dB Safe Volume Control 】 : Specially designed for children, the kids headphones can be limited to a sound level of 85dB to prevent damages to kid's ears in daily life, and also allow to reach 94dB for clearer but still safe sound under the condition of airplane rumbles, car noises etc.

【Stereo Sound & Share Port 】: With built-in 40mm drivers, our headphones emit a full balanced stereo sound, making them perfect for playing games and listening to music. Kids can insert another headphone plug into the sharing jack to share audio with friends or families, no splitters or special cables needed.

【Comfort Wear & Foldable Design】: The ultra-soft earmuffs and over-ear design make better isolation from ambient noise and good breathability, thus your kids won't feel tired even for a long-time wear. kids headphones for travel are foldable and compact, convenient for carrying and storage.

【Generous Warranty】: At iClever, we always put customers first, and we're proud to stand by the quality of our products. You are entitled to enjoy 24-hour Customer-friendly Support Service. Any questions please feel hassle-free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Equipped with a gorgeous MIC, the children's headphones can pick up clear sound in real time without lag, which is perfect for online courses and audio conversation.Children's ears are vulnerable to sound damage, hence choose the 85dB volume limiter for daily use. If the child is in a noisy environment like car or airplane, please adjust the limiter to 94dB for crystal clear sound.

Comfortable Earpads & Stereo Sound With a combination of soft ear cushions and 40mm drivers, these kids headphones deliver a full balanced stereo sound and comfortable listening experience. Premium Stereo Sound Crafted with HD 40mm driver to deliver clear, balanced sound, the iClever Teens headphones reproduce the sound of your favorite music, give an comfortable listening experience. Easy to Carry Thanks to the compact and foldable design, iClever children headphones are convenient to store and be taken for an enjoyable outdoor trip.

Protect Child's Auditory System iClever kids headphones limiting the volume level at 85 dB is based upon the highest safe exposure level to continuous 8 hours. The built-in microphone supports hands-free calling, especially video chatting with great ease. 3.5mm Universal Plug The wide-compatible 3. 5mm plug allow the headphones to be used with all 3. 5mm jack devices like Chromebook, Nintendo Switch, iPad, Smartphone, Computer, MP3/4, Kindle Fire Tablet, Study Tablet, Laptop, PC etc. The Studying Assistant Long hours listening to classes or music can bother kids' ears. We designed the HS19 children headphones with an adjustable headband and extra cushioning in the ears for an extra-comfortable fit. Additionally, the over-ear design further relieves the ears from any unwanted pressure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing customer service!
reviews.reviewText: My son really loves these earphones! The cord ripped after a few months and they replaced it without any questions! Amazing customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Travel Companion - iClever HS19 Kids Headphones!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the iClever HS19 Kids Headphones with Microphone for my 7-year-old's long plane ride, and I must say they were an absolute lifesaver! These headphones turned out to be the perfect travel companion, providing a comfortable and enjoyable experience for my little one.First and foremost, the design and size are ideal for young children. The headphones fit perfectly over my 7-year-old's ears without feeling too tight or uncomfortable, allowing him to wear them for an extended period without any complaints. The adjustable headband is a thoughtful feature that ensures a secure fit as he grows.The sound quality was excellent, striking a perfect balance between clear audio and child-safe volume levels. I appreciated the thoughtful consideration put into protecting young ears while still delivering an enjoyable listening experience. The headphones provided crystal-clear sound, making it easy for my child to enjoy his favorite music and watch videos during the long plane ride.Additionally, the headphones' durability and sturdiness were evident throughout the trip. Despite being used by a playful and energetic 7-year-old, they held up remarkably well, showing no signs of wear and tear.Another feature I appreciated was the foldable design, making it easy to store the headphones in our carry-on bag without taking up much space. It added to the convenience of travel and ensured that the headphones remained protected during transit.In conclusion, the iClever HS19 Kids Headphones with Microphone proved to be a fantastic investment for our long plane ride. They provided excellent sound quality, a comfortable fit, and a convenient microphone for communication. With their durable build and child-friendly design, these headphones are sure to be a reliable companion for any young traveler or music enthusiast. I highly recommend them to parents looking for high-quality headphones for their kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, fits comfortably
reviews.reviewText: Kindergartner loves these headphones. He chose them due to the vivid colors. They are comfortable, easy to put on and keep on and has good sound quality. Have been durable. He’ll be able to continue use these through elementary school due to the size adjustment available. A great value for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size for travel
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 4 year old who is on the smaller side so they were a bit big on their smallest setting but when my 6 year old uses it , it fits great. The sound is clear , the way they fold can fit into small kids backpacks, hey are durable as my kids are not gentle with them and they still work perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for school
reviews.reviewText: These headphones are great for school headphones. I wanted to get cute but cheap headphones for my child to keep in her class and these are great. They look very sturdy and comfortable. They also fold nicely for great storage. I had previously bought her the ones with the light up ears for double the price and they would always break. These have held out for longer. Will huy again for my next child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the headphones, I got them for my 4 year old for when we go on our trip he has tried them out already of course and they work really good, have a controlled volume to like cancel noise they are great and price was really good. Worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product & customer service
reviews.reviewText: We ordered one for our son, age 6, for when we travel. We were impressed with how well it works. We also like that it has ear protection, as well as the option to make it louder for ambient noise like on airplanes. We ordered another one for him to use at school, and we also ordered one for his sister. The one we ordered for school broke recently, and it was still under a year. So we contacted customer service, and they were fantastic! They replied quickly, attempted to troubleshoot the issue, and then they sent us a replacement for our broken one, when it was clear it couldn’t be fixed. For the price, quality, and service- buying this is a no-brainer. And the other headphones we have from them for longer have had no issues and work well. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these headphones. They are very sturdy and comfortable. Easy to fold up so they don’t break. Great sound quality as well. I highly recommend for kids!

Satisfaite de mon achat pour mon fils de 8 ans afin qu'il puisse écouter ses histoires avec sa conteuse. La qualité est bonne, le casque semble robuste. Le son n'est pas trop faible et de bonne qualité. J'apprécie le fait qu'il puisse se plier pour se ranger plus facilement. Mon fils est ravie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Light weight and comfortable to wear
reviews.reviewText: Light weight , comfortable to wear , so I've been told by my 8yr old :) she love's the sound quality and the colour combination, They seem too be made sturdy with good quality plastics, good length of cable and head adjustment ,........( we will see how long they last ,,,,, I will update this review if they break :P )........ The ear and head padding are nice'n soft ,, she was wearing these as soon as they were delivered and watched one of her films which was about 1hr 35minutes long with no problems , she didnt get any ear ache which you sometimes get when wearing these type of headphones squashing the ears, because they are softly padded , she also liked the control button on the lead so she could pause and unpause the film when needed :) overhaul she's happy with them ,.As an adult I also found them to be comfortable to wear with ther adjustments easily made either side , They do have a nice clear crisp sound and decent bass tone ... we was using a samsung tablet
Cuffia molto bella l' audio si sente bene.

Das der Kabel nur auf eine Seite ist, ist viel währt. Ich habe mich bewusst für Kabel entschieden.Für größere Kinder so ab 10 mit einen großen Kopf würde ich es nicht mehr kaufen. Es past zwar noch aber bei länger Tragen tun die Ohren weh (druckstellen). Ansonsten super empfehlenswert. Ton und Qualität passt perfekt.
